content: Stocks DBS Vickers Securities Dividends Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 25 Jul 2019Would dividends from my stocks get credited into my CDP DCS bank account OR get credited back into my DBS Vickers Multi-Currency account?Hello, recently made some stocks investments and am wondering where will the dividends be credited into - CDP or MCA? TIA!2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Elijah Lee, Independent Financial Advisor at Phillip Securities (Jurong East Lite)Top Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 26 Jul 2019CDP will credit the dividends into the bank account you specified during account opening. If you need to change it, there is a form to do so.0 comments5

SKShabir Khan, Graduate Of Aviation Management & Services at Temasek PolytechnicLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 26 Jul 2019Hi,It will get credited in to your CDP DCS account, which is whichever bank account you have linked it with. If you want to change the DCS account, you can do so by logging into CDP website and changing it under profile.0 comments0
